mapper.select: select count(1) as count,date_format(estimated_arrive_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as reservationDate from srv_reservation_order where estimated_arrive_time >= date_format(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') and estimated_arrive_time <= date_sub(curdate(), interval -7 day) and store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY date_format(estimated_arrive_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(estimated_arrive_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update srv_reservation_order set update_time=now(),status='OVER' where status in ('UNCONFIRMED','CONFIRMED') and now() > DATE_ADD(estimated_arrive_time,INTERVAL #{expireTime} SECOND)
